alert.note: Alert for Cass (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 31 at 11:01PM EDT until March 31 at 11:30PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 PM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN WHITE...FULTON...SOUTHEASTERN PULASKI...NORTHWESTERN CASS AND SOUTHEASTERN MARSHALL COUNTIES... At 1059 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Bourbon to near Rochester to Royal Center, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Rochester, Argos, Royal Center, Walnut, Tippecanoe, Kewanna, Fulton, Leiters Ford, Nyena Lake, Leases Corner, Delong, Old Tip Town, Lake Bruce, Star City, Tiosa, Thornhope, Lake Manitou, Lucerne, Talma and Athens. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 300 AM EDT for north central and northwestern Indiana. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
